definition: roof/roof plate/rock layer forming roof of a cave or mine/abacus

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The ceiling had collapsed, blocking a path to the tunnel opening.
sentences.chinese: 頂板垮塌下來，堵塞了通往道口的通道。

sentences.english: The data of roof separation is considered to be a comprehensive index that can forecast the stability of roadways .
sentences.chinese: 頂板離層值是一個能預測巷道穩定性的綜合指標。

sentences.english: Collapse of stope roof, is one of disasters occuring at underground mines.
sentences.chinese: 礦山採場頂板冒落是地下礦山開採中常見的災害。

sentences.english: Three children and a mother were living in that small room with a low-ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 小屋的頂板低矮，裏面住着三個孩子和一位母親。

sentences.english: The gas extraction effects is related to negative pressure of suction.
sentences.chinese: 頂板瓦斯高抽巷的抽採效果與抽放負壓直接相關。

sentences.english: The top ceiling of basement was the weak place for energy saving and thermal insulation in the building.
sentences.chinese: 地下室頂板是建築節能和建築隔熱保溫的薄弱部位。

sentences.english: The roof separation layer is the biggest security hidden danger in bolt support tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 頂板離層是錨杆支護巷道最大的安全隱患之一。

sentences.english: There are two lights on the roof of the pressing room.
sentences.chinese: 兩個照明燈鑲嵌在壓片室內頂板上。

sentences.english: But the beam model is an approximate model in studying the roof problems.
sentences.chinese: 但用梁模型來研究採場頂板問題具有相當的近似性。

sentences.english: The safety thickness of roof forecasting model is obtained by stepwise regression ana…
sentences.chinese: 本文最後還分析了頂拱裂隙對安全頂板厚度的影響。

sentences.english: The roof abscission layer is the biggest security hidden danger in bolting support tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 頂板離層是錨杆支護巷道最大的安全隱患之一。

sentences.english: In a basement, the top and bottom plates are often different lengths.
sentences.chinese: 地下室的頂板和底板的長度往往不同。

sentences.english: there was a roof deck with a pool table, and an enclosed cafe space.
sentences.chinese: 房裏有屋頂板，一個檯球桌，還有一個封閉的咖啡間。

sentences.english: The application of seismic attribute technology to predict coal roof lithologic character was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了應用地震屬性技術預測煤層頂板巖性的方法。

sentences.english: On the basis of the analysis, the view that strengthen the roof can control the floor heave was put forward.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，提出了加固巷道頂板控制底鼓的觀點。

sentences.english: Collapse of stope roofs is one of disasters occurring at underground mines.
sentences.chinese: 礦山採場頂板冒落是地下礦山開採中常見的災害。
